bibl.title: Bemerkungen zu Papyri XIII. <Korr. Tyche>.
bibl.author: Hagedorn Gonis
bibl.note: 341-351 (Dieter HAGEDORN). - 341. Antoninus Pius oder Marcus Aurelius? [O. Stras. 371; 372; 486; 488; 502]. - 342. Die Datierung des Archivs der Thermuthis, Tochter des Psen(t)kalibis. [O. Stras. und O. Leiden]. - 343. B.G.U. IV, 1070 = M.Chrest. 323. - 344. P. Heid. III, 232. - 345. P. Lond. II, 347 (p. 71). - 346. P. Oxy. XII, 1446. - 347. P. Oxy. LXIII, 4388. - 348. P. Oxy. LXIII, 4398. - 349. P. Ryl. II, 73. - 350. P.S.I. I, 36a, 3-4 und P. I.F.A.O. I, 8, 3-5. - 351. V.B.P. [= P. Baden] II, 14. - 352-372 (Nikolaos GONIS, Notes on VI.-VIII. Century Documents [II]). - (a) Determining the Provenance. - 352. P. Berol. Inv. 21755 [ed.: Angeliki SYRCOU, Six Byzantine Documents, ArchPF 42 (1996) pp. 92-97]. - 353. P. Berol. Inv. 21737 [ed.: Angeliki SYRCOU, ibidem, pp. 97-103]. - 354. S.P.P. III, 411. - (b) Filling the Gaps. - 355. Korr. Tyche 253 (P. Egypt. Mus. [= P. Cair.] Inv. SR 3066 (8) [ed.: Alia HANAFI, Four Unpublished Documents of the Papyrus Collections in Cairo and Copenhagen, Akten des 21. Internationalen Papyrologenkongresses = ArchPF. Beiheft 3. I (Stuttgart - Leipzig, 1997) pp. 403-406 et pll. VII, 3]). - 356. P.S.I. VIII, 964. - 357. S.B. I, 4843 [= P. Paris Louvre Inv. App. 729]: A Work Contract? - 358. S.B. XIV, 11896 [= P.S.I. III, 185]. - 359. S.B. XVI, 12585 [= P. Mich. Inv. 3769]. - 360. S.B. XVI, 12867 [= P. Lond. III, 1315a descr.]. - 361. S.B. XVIII, 13885 [= P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 16788 + 25507]. - (c) Questions of Interpretation. - 362. C.P.R. XII, 32 [Coptic]. - 363. P. Ant. III, 201: Donkeys and capita. - 364. P. Bodl. I, 145: Some Curious buccellarii. - 365. P. Lond. copt. I, 1114: An Unnoticed vice-dominus. - 366. S.B. XVI, 12280 [= P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 24455]: ımoË and ımo€vw. - 367. S.B. XVIII, 13272 [= P. Berol. Inv. 7884]: A Ghost Fraction. - 368. S.P.P. III, 369: The Acting logistes Hermogenes Again? - 369. S.P.P. VIII, 1069: xvr(€a) and xvr(Æmata). - (d) Redating Some Coptic Tax Receipts from Jême. - 370. O.M.H. 346. - 371. Abbreviated Phaophi. - 372. K.S.B. I, 263: An Old Misprint Carried over. <homou, homoios, chor(ia), chor(emata)>
